user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Architecture Design
epics.summary: Establish foundational structure and technical stack
epics.description: Set up the project repository, configure the development environment, define the architecture and select the technology stack required for successful project implementation. Define the folder structure, module organization, and CI/CD pipeline setup to ensure scalability and maintainability of the project.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user login, logout, and registration functionality
epics.description: Develop secure user authentication and authorization features, including user registration, login, password encryption, session handling, and role-based access control. Integrate with a backend authentication service such as OAuth or JWT for a robust and secure validation process.

epics.title: Core Application Functionality Development
epics.summary: Build main product features and core workflows
epics.description: Implement the primary business logic and key features that define the application's purpose. Ensure proper CRUD operations, validations, and back-end integrations that enable end-users to perform their core tasks efficiently. Include comprehensive error handling and test coverage for core modules.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Design and develop responsive and intuitive user interfaces
epics.description: Design and develop UI components that provide a seamless, visually appealing user experience. Implement responsive layouts, consistent design elements, and accessibility features following modern UI/UX design standards. Integrate front-end frameworks such as React or Vue for dynamic interfaces.

epics.title: Data Analytics and Insights Module
epics.summary: Implement advanced data reporting and insights visualization
epics.description: Develop analytical dashboards and reporting features that transform raw data into actionable insights. Integrate analytical tools or build custom data visualization components to track user engagement, performance metrics, and system health in real-time.

epics.title: Deployment and Monitoring
epics.summary: Setup production-ready environments and monitoring tools
epics.description: Deploy the completed application to a production environment with optimized configuration. Set up monitoring tools for performance, error tracking, and uptime checks. Implement automated deployment through CI/CD workflows to ensure reliability and efficiency in future releases.

user_stories.title: Setup repository and tools
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to setup repositories and tools, so that I have a reliable environment to start development.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Repositories and tools are setup and accessible.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a clean environment, when I setup repositories and tools, then they should be accessible and operational.

user_stories.title: Initial configurations
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to configure initial settings, so that the project environment is standardized.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Configure continuous integration, environment variables, architecture guidelines, API standards, database standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Configurations comply with guidelines; CI pipeline is operational.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an unconfigured project, when initial configurations are done, then CI pipeline should work and standards should be established.

user_stories.title: User registration and login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register and login, so that I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include secure registration, login, encryption of credentials.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be able to register and login securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when they register, then their account should be created securely. Given a registered user, when they login correctly, then they should access their account.

user_stories.title: Password recovery
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to recover my password, so that I can regain access if forgotten.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can recover password securely using token.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has forgotten their password, when they initiate recovery, then they should be able to reset it using a token.

user_stories.title: User profile management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to manage my profile, so that I can update my personal information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow updating user details; ensure data encryption.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can update their profile securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they update their profile, then the changes should be saved and secured.

user_stories.title: Define entities and workflows
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to define core entities and workflows, so that the application structure is established.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core entities and workflows are defined and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when entities and workflows are defined, then they should align with business requirements.

user_stories.title: Data handling and validation
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement data handling and validation, so that user inputs are managed correctly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data validation, handle errors gracefully.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data handling and validation mechanisms are in place.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user input, when data is processed, then it should be validated and errors handled appropriately.

user_stories.title: User flow across main features
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a seamless experience, so that I can complete tasks without issues.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can navigate and use main features seamlessly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core features, when a user interacts, then they should complete tasks smoothly without errors.

user_stories.title: Responsive interface design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive interface, so that I can use the application on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement responsive design using modern frameworks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The application is responsive and user-friendly across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given various devices, when the application is accessed, then it should be responsive and functional.

user_stories.title: UI component reusability
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want reusable UI components, so that I can maintain consistency and efficiency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: UI components are reusable and consistent.
user_stories.test_cases: Given UI guidelines, when components are developed, then they should be reusable and maintain design consistency.

user_stories.title: Analytics implementation
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want analytics dashboards, so that I can track performance metrics and user activities.
user_stories.test_cases: Given live data, when analytics are tracked, then dashboards should display accurate user activities and performance metrics.

user_stories.title: Implement real-time notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time notifications, so that I am immediately aware of important events.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an event, when it occurs, then real-time notifications should be sent to users.

user_stories.title: Third-party service integrations
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party services, so that extended functionalities are available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given third-party service APIs, when integration is done, then extended functionalities should be accessible.

user_stories.title: End-to-end functionality testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to conduct end-to-end tests, so that product stability is ensured.
user_stories.test_cases: Given complete features, when tested end-to-end, then all should function without defects.

user_stories.title: Staging and production environment setup
user_stories.description: As a devops engineer, I want staging and production environments, so that deployments are managed efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Set up staging and production environments; use CI/CD pipelines.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Staging and production environments are functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a deployment pipeline, when environments are set up, then deployments should be manageable and efficient.

user_stories.title: Monitoring and performance tuning
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to monitor and tune performance, so that the system remains reliable post-deployment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement monitoring tools, perform performance tuning.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System performance is monitored and tuned continuously.
user_stories.test_cases: Given live production, when monitoring tools are in place, then system reliability and performance should be optimal.
